Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
formula: a(n) = n*(1+Sum_{d|n} d*phi(d))/2 = n*(1+A057660(n))/2 = n*A057661(n). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 21 2002
maple: a:=n->sum(ilcm( n, 1, j ),j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=1..39); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 07 2006
prog: (Haskell)a051193 = sum . a051173_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 11 2014(PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, lcm(n,k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 06 2015
